<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sound Mirror](/Feats.aspx?ID=3811) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 127</row>

**Archetype** [Alter Ego](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=187)

**Prerequisites**
[Alter Ego Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3807)

</column>

---

You twist not just the visual, but the auditory as well, allowing you to pass without a sound and create minor noises as distractions—perfect for misdirection and infiltration. You can cast [_silence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) on yourself as a 2nd-level innate occult spell and [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) as a 1st-level innate occult spell, both once per day. You also can cast [_ghost sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=132) as an innate occult cantrip. You become trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your key spellcasting ability is Charisma.
name: Sound Mirror
